dcterms:description: A dataset containing hypothetical values for the sensitivity and specificity of COVID-19 tests, as well as the prevalence of COVID-19 in the population, used to illustrate the application of Bayes' rule in calculating post-test probabilities.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Test Sensitivity and Specificity

dcterms:description: A dataset containing hypothetical values for the prevalence of COVID-19 and the probability of cough given COVID-19, used to illustrate the application of Bayes' rule in calculating post-test probabilities.
dcterms:title: Prevalence of COVID-19

dcterms:description: A dataset containing hypothetical values for the probability of a cough given COVID-19 and the probability of a cough given no COVID-19, used to illustrate the application of Bayes' rule in calculating post-test probabilities.
dcterms:title: Probability of Cough Given COVID-19

dcterms:description: A dataset containing hypothetical values for the probability of a positive test result given COVID-19 and the probability of a positive test result given no COVID-19, used to illustrate the application of Bayes' rule in calculating post-test probabilities.
dcterms:title: Probability of Positive Test Given COVID-19

dcterms:description: A dataset containing hypothetical values for the probability of a positive test result given the presence of a cough, used to illustrate the application of Bayes' rule in calculating post-test probabilities.
dcterms:title: Probability of Positive Test Given Cough
